quote: When someone wrongs you, you both share the burden of that wrongdoing - the pain of it weighs on both of you. Forgiveness, then, means choosing to bear the full weight all by yourself.
quote_letters: WHEN SOMEONE WRONGS YOU YOU BOTH SHARE THE BURDEN OF THAT WRONGDOING - THE PAIN OF IT WEIGHS ON BOTH OF YOU FORGIVENESS THEN MEANS CHOOSING TO BEAR THE FULL WEIGHT ALL BY YOURSELF
